title: Ticket #94: gridmanager mishandles gram error 156
description:
Gram error 156 (JOB_CONTACT_NOT_FOUND) occurs when a client tries to contact a jobmanager but their job ids don’t match. This can happen when the jobmanager the client was talking to exits and a jobmanager for a different job is started and binds to the same port.

When the gridmanage sees this error, it treats it like most other errors, first sending a STOP_JM message, then sending a cancel command, then putting the job on hold in the schedd. Instead, it should try to restart the jobmanager.
